metadata.title: CVE-2021-37974 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Safebrowsing in Google Chrome prior to 94.0.4606.71allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the renderer process topotentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
